content.p: This page lists selected resources for Europe including sources of vacancies as well as information on living and working in particular countries. While we do not have country-specific expertise, our staff can offer advice on putting together an effective job-hunting strategy to seek work abroad. We subscribe to an international careers information package called GoinGlobal. You can access GoinGlobal free as a UoN student or graduate. GoinGlobal contains: Log in to MyCareer for access to GoinGlobal If you have any problems logging into MyCareer, please email our team. Lauren Ogden, Modern Language Studies graduate Read Lauren's blog article Use additional sources of vacancies and country guides selected by our staff for more information on job markets and opportunities abroad. Prospects Country guides for many countries around Europe TARGETjobs Country guides for many countries around Europe British Council Opportunities in the Study, Work, Create section Cturtle Job opportunities around the world EURES: The European Job Mobility Portal Information about living, studying and working in Europe, with a database of job opportunities The Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) Listing of foreign embassies in the UK, and visa and travel information GradLink Central & Eastern Europe Jobs, advice, news, case studies and more Jooble - Job opportunities across the world World Chambers Network (WCN) Database of chambers of commerce and boards of trade around the world For information on teaching in international schools worldwide, visit our Teaching page. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
